```{r}
CVD1.data<- read.csv(file="C:/Users/bushr/OneDrive/Desktop/CVD.csv",header=TRUE, sep=",", stringsAsFactors = TRUE) 
Exercise.rel<- relevel(CVD1.data$Exercise, ref = "Yes")
Depression.rel<- relevel(CVD1.data$Depression, ref = "Yes")
Sex.rel<- relevel(CVD1.data$Sex, ref = "Male")
Smoking.rel<- relevel(CVD1.data$Smoking, ref = "Yes")

fitted.model<- glm(Heart_Disease ~ Exercise.rel + Depression.rel + Sex.rel + Smoking.rel + Age_Category + BMI + FriedPotato_Consumption,
                    data = CVD1.data, family = binomial(link = "logit"))
summary(fitted.model)
```

```{r}
null.model<- glm(Heart_Disease ~ 1, data=CVD1.data, family=binomial(link=logit)) 
print(deviance<- -2*(logLik(null.model)-logLik(fitted.model))) 
```

```{r}
print(p.value<- pchisq(deviance,6,lower.tail = FALSE)) 
```
